name.en: Chemical and Materials Engineering Thermodynamics I
name.ch: 化工與材料熱力學 I

department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.ch: 目標於建立學生在化工熱力學之核心理論基礎，及增進學生在化工程序分析應用及計算之能力。
goal.en: The purpose is to introduce the basic concept in Thermodynamics for enhancing the analysis and prediction in each chemical engineering process.

outline.ch:
以古典熱力學之第一、第二為基礎, 透過數學模式了解化學反應, 自發性反應以及反應過程中能量上的轉化, 此外也
探討不同化工製程於封閉及開放系統中之能量平衡, 並且探討純物質以及混合物之各種熱力學性質的關聯性, 協助學生建立在化工熱力學之基礎。
outline.en: Introduction of fundamental concepts of classical thermodynamics, first/second law of thermodynamics is aim to emphases on the application of mathematical methods to the study of the spontaneity of processes, chemical reactions, and chemical energy. In addition, this study is also aim to discuss the chemical energy balance during close/open system operation and realize the thermo-properties of pure chemical and mixture.

textbook.ch: Stanley I. Sandler, Principles of Chemical, Biochemical and Engineering Thermodynamics 5/e Wiley Custom Edition
textbook.en: Stanley I. Sandler, Principles of Chemical, Biochemical and Engineering Thermodynamics 5/e Wiley Custom Edition
